title: Milk powder prices increased again
body_lines: Price of milk powder has been increased with effect from yesterday ( May 15 2022) .
Accordingly the price of a 400g pack of Milk Powder will be Rs.1020.
The price of milk powder was last increased in March this year where the prices of a 400g pack shot up by Rs 250 and a 1kg pack was increased by Rs 600.
